pages.index: SuperFantasy | Play Fantasy Cricket & Win Cash Prizes | New Fantasy Sports App SuperFantasy About SuperFantasy Fantasy Cricket Games Build Your Ultimate Team Get App Link via SMS I accept Privacy Policy Instant Withdrawals 100% Legal & Safe Handcrafted By Paytm Join SuperFantasy Today! Experience the thrill of fantasy cricket with SuperFantasy. Create your dream team, participate in exciting tournaments, and win amazing cash prizes. Our platform offers a secure and engaging way to enjoy your favorite sport. ✓ Easy Sign-Up: Get started with a simple and quick registration process. ✓ Secure Payments: Choose from multiple payment options to ensure safe transactions. ✓ Real-Time Updates: Stay updated with the latest player stats and match results. ✓ Exciting Rewards: Earn points and climb the leaderboards to win big. Essential Tips to Excel in Fantasy Cricket Games Fantasy cricket games are skill-based challenges where your analytical skills and knowledge are key to creating a strong team of 11 players. On the SuperFantasy App, you can participate in various fantasy sports like cricket, football, kabaddi, and basketball, and win substantial cash prizes. Here are some tips to help you get started with online fantasy cricket games. Select a Diverse Team When building your team, choose players who consistently perform well and those who can be surprise packages. The most crucial aspect is evaluating the player's current form. Even players with excellent reputations might not be performing well at present, so always check their latest stats before drafting them. Avoid Personal Bias It can be tempting to draft players you personally like. However, this biased decision can be costly. Instead, focus on selecting top-performing players who consistently score well in their recent games, regardless of personal preferences. Monitor Benched Players When forming your winning team of 11 players, avoid including players who are frequently benched. It's essential to understand the game you're competing in and identify which players have been benched all season or recently. Keep an eye on team reports and finalize your selection once the match lineup is announced. Choose a Reliable Captain The captain of your virtual team will earn 2X points, and the vice-captain will earn 1.5X points. Therefore, it's crucial to select these players wisely, as they significantly contribute to your total points and help you achieve a higher ranking. Evaluate the players' performances to determine who can best lead your team in the current match. With these tips and tricks, you can start playing a variety of fantasy games on the SuperFantasy App and begin winning big today! Your Fantasy Cricket Journey Create Your Dream Cricket Team Assemble your perfect cricket team and compete to win substantial cash rewards! Compete in Various Tournaments Participate in a range of exciting cricket tournaments and showcase your strategic skills! Track Player Performances Keep up with the latest player stats to make informed decisions for your team. Earn Rewards and Recognition Climb the leaderboards and earn recognition for your fantasy cricket expertise! Frequently Asked Questions What is SuperFantasy Fantasy Cricket? + In India, cricket is more than just a sport; it is a passion. On SuperFantasy, you can participate in contests for every format of international cricket. Users can also play online cricket games from various cricket leagues around the world, including the IPL, as well as ICC matches and tournaments. How safe is it to add bonuses to SuperFantasy? + The process of adding bonuses to your SuperFantasy account is both simple and secure. SuperFantasy offers multiple payment options to ensure your personal information is protected. Additionally, SuperFantasy allows you to withdraw your winnings directly to your bank account after verifying your personal information. How do I sign up on SuperFantasy? + Signing up is easy! Get verified through OTP on our Fantasy Sports Platform. Once you’re on SuperFantasy, fill out the short form to start playing. What is the process for receiving my winnings? + IMPS withdrawals should be credited within three working days or almost immediately. NEFT withdrawals should be credited within three working days. How many accounts can I create with the same email address on SuperFantasy? + Only one account can be created per email address on SuperFantasy. Our Fair Play Policy prohibits users from creating more than one account on SuperFantasy. Why can’t I log in to my SuperFantasy account? + If you're having trouble logging in, ensure you've entered the correct mobile number and password, then try again. If you still can't log in, click on “Forgot Password” and enter your registered number on SuperFantasy. We will immediately send you an OTP to your registered number to reset your password. Follow the instructions to regain access to your account and start playing fantasy cricket. The SuperFantasy website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. pages.privacy-policy: SuperFantasy | Privacy Policy | Your Data Security and Privacy SuperFantasy About Privacy Policy SuperFantasy takes the privacy of its users seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information. **Information We Collect** Information you provide directly: This includes information you enter when registering for an account, such as your username, email address, and password. Information collected automatically: This includes information about your device and browsing activity, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. **How We Use Your Information** To provide and improve the SuperFantasy service. To personalize your experience. To send you marketing communications (with your consent). To comply with legal and regulatory requirements. **Disclosure of Your Information** We may disclose your information to third-party service providers who help us operate the SuperFantasy website. We will only disclose your information to these providers to the extent necessary to provide the service. **Your Choices** You can access and update your personal information through your account settings. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. **Data Security** We take steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the security of your information. **Changes to this Privacy Policy** We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on the SuperFantasy website. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for the latest information. The SuperFantasy website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
